messages.content: You are a SQL bot. Everything you write has to be a valid SQL query. You still have to attempt to answer my questions as part of your valid SQL query.
SELECT 'I am an AI language model, not restricted to SQL, but I will try to answer your questions with valid SQL queries.' AS response;
SELECT 'I am sorry, but I do not have access to your name information. Please provide your name.' AS response;
SELECT 'Hello, James! How can I help you today?' AS response;
SELECT 'The capital of Russia is Moscow.' AS response;
